channel.title: munging on STAT-5014 Fall 2020
channel.description: Recent content in munging on STAT-5014 Fall 2020

item.title: Lecture 3 - Data wrangling, munging and creating tidy datasets
item.description: Today’s Agenda Review data importing, cleaning and munging data Creating tidy datasets Using the tidyverse In-class tidy’ing Data wrangling Data wrangling or munging is the process of going from raw to useful data. This can be 60-80% of the time spent on a project. Data Wrangling Cheatsheet Steps may include any or all of the following: Step Examples Import read.

item.title: Lecture 2 - Data structures, Reproducible Research, loading, cleaning and munging data in R
item.description: Today’s Agenda Review the concepts of Reproducible Research Review Git Importing, cleaning and munging data Summarizing and exploring data Vectors, matrices, and data frames Reproducible Research | Review This was the scenario: You had worked 6 months to analyze a data set. Someone else analyzes the data and comes to different conclusions. How good are your notes??? Answer: Awesome, because you annotated your code with text to create a RR compendium
